GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: Fix UAF in ieee80211_scan_rx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.66 by commit 5d20c6f932f2758078d0454729129c894fe353e7. For more details please see the references link.
